product_name: Adventure Medical Kits Mountain Fundamentals First-Aid Kit
long_description: Lightweight design, powerful component assortment and affordable price make the Adventure Medical Mountain Fundamentals first-aid kit a great choice for the prepared backpacker. Easy Care(TM) system organizes contents by injury type, saving valuable response time. All contents are packed together in easily identifiable, clear vinyl compartments. Bright blue color and reflective trim make kit highly visible and easy to find in low-light conditions. Contains medical supplies for groups up to 8 people on a 1- to 14-day trip. Essentials: digital thermometer, EMT shears, splinter picker forceps, duct tape, 2 pill vials, 3 safety pins, accident report and pencil. Medications: 8 acetaminophen, 4 antihistamine, 2 aspirin and 8 ibuprofen. CPR/bleeding: CPR face shield, 2 trauma pads and 4 nitrile gloves. Wound care: 20cc irrigation syringe, 0.75 oz. povidone iodine, 10 wound-closure strips, 2 tincturs of benzoin and 3 triple antibiotic ointments. Also: 6 After Cuts and Scrapes(R) antiseptic wipes, 10 gauze pads, 3 non-adherent sterile dressings and 1 stockinette bandage. 2 conforming gauze bandages, 10 yards tape, 13 strip and knuckle bandages and 4 cotton-tipped applicators. Burn/blister care: 1 aloe vera gel with lidocaine, 2 GlacierGel blister pads and 11 precut and shaped moleskin pieces. Fracture/sprain care: 1 SAM(R) splint, 1 elastic bandage with VELCRO(R) brand closure and 1 triangular bandage. Also includes, ''A Comprehensive Guide to Wilderness and Travel Medicine''.
short_description: Lightweight design, powerful component assortment and affordable price make the Adventure Medical Mountain Fundamentals first-aid kit a great choice for the prepared backpacker.
